adjectives.description: pokerlike (comparative more pokerlike, superlative most pokerlike)

entries.meaning: Resembling or characteristic of a poker (metal rod).
examples: An animal caught off balance at the onset may fall to the ground with limbs fixed pokerlike in extension...

entries.meaning: Resembling or characteristic of the card game of poker.
examples: The original Battlestar Galactica featured triad, a basketball/football hybrid; pyramid, a pokerlike game; and pets  […]
